anya-e0104n2:3_2: Paññā bhāvetabbā samādhibhāvanāya samannāgatena bhikkhunāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n2:3_4: gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṁ vā “samādhisilāyaṁ sunisitaṁ vipassanāpaññāsattha”nti evaṁ ativiya saṅkhepena bhāsitattā
anya-e0104n2:3_5: ayaṁ sā paññāti sabhāvato viññātumpi tāva na sukarā.
anya-e0104n2:3_6: Bhāvanāvidhānassa pana adassitattā pageva bhāvetuṁ na sukarāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n2:4_1: Kenaṭṭhena paññāti kena atthena paññāti vuccati,
anya-e0104n2:4_2: “paññā”ti padaṁ kaṁ abhidheyyatthaṁ nissāya pavattanti attho.
anya-e0104n2:4_5: āsannakāraṇato ca kathaṁ jānitabbāti āha “kānassā lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānī”ti.
anya-e0104n2:4_7: Kasmā panettha saṁkilesavodānapucchā na gahitāti? Vuccate –
anya-e0104n2:4_9: Asati ca tasmiṁ kuto vodānapucchāti tadubhayaṁ na gahitaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:4_10: Lokiyāya pana tāni bhāvanāvidhāne eva antogadhānīti katvā visuṁ na gahitāni maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiantogadhattā,
anya-e0104n2:4_11: samādhibhāvanāyaṁ vā vuttanayānusārena veditabbānīti na gahitāni.
anya-e0104n2:4_12: Paṭipatti nāma diṭṭhānisaṁse eva hotīti āha “paññābhāvanāya ko ānisaṁso”ti.
anya-e0104n2:5_3: Pucchito hi attho avibhāvitattā nigūḷho muṭṭhiyaṁ kato viya tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n2:5_6: vibhāgavantānaṁ pana sabhāvavibhāvanaṁ vibhāgadassanamukheneva hotīti vibhāgo tāva anavasesato dassetabbo.
anya-e0104n2:5_7: Taṁdassanena ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṁ “paññā bahuvidhā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:5_12: Na sādheyyāti vipassanābhāvanāya saddhiṁ maggabhāvanā idha adhippetattho.
anya-e0104n2:5_15: Anavasesato hi paññāpabhede vissajjiyamāne “ekavidhena ñāṇavatthū”tiādiko sabbo ñāṇavatthu vibhaṅge,
anya-e0104n2:5_16: suttantesu ca tattha tattha āgato paññāpabhedo.
anya-e0104n2:5_17: Sakalopi vā abhidhammanayo āharitvā vissajjetabbo bhaveyya,
anya-e0104n2:5_18: tathā ca sati yvāyaṁ idha paññābhāvanāvidhi adhippeto,
anya-e0104n2:5_21: sopi yathārahaṁ saddhiṁ phalāphalabhedena vibhajitvā vissajjetabbo siyā.
anya-e0104n2:5_22: So ca pana vissajjiyamāno aññadatthu vikkhepāya saṁvatteyya,
anya-e0104n2:5_25: Kusalacittasampayuttaṁ vipassanāñāṇanti ettha kusala-ggahaṇena duvidhampi abyākataṁ nivatteti,
anya-e0104n2:5_26: tathā “atthi saṁkiliṭṭhapaññā”ti evaṁ pavattaṁ micchāvādaṁ paṭisedheti.
anya-e0104n2:6_5: tena “lohitakaṁ odātaṁ dīghaṁ rassa”ntiādike saññāya gahetabbākāre saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n2:6_6: Sañjānanamattamevāti ettha sañjānanaṁ nāma “nīlaṁ pīta”ntiādikaṁ ārammaṇe vijjamānaṁ vā avijjamānaṁ vā saññānimittaṁ katvā jānanaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:6_9: eva-saddena kadācipi imissā te visesā natthevāti avadhāreti.
anya-e0104n2:6_11: Tattha viññāṇakiccampi kātuṁ asakkontī saññā kuto paññākiccaṁ kareyyāti “lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṁ pāpetuṁ na sakkoti”cceva vuttaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:6_13: Ārammaṇe pavattamānaṁ viññāṇaṁ na tattha saññā viya nīlapītādikassa sañjānanavaseneva pavattati,
anya-e0104n2:6_14: atha kho tattha aññañca visesaṁ jānantameva pavattatīti āha “viññāṇa”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n2:6_17: Lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya hi anekavāraṁ lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā paṭivijjhitvā pavattamānāya paguṇabhāvato
anya-e0104n2:6_19: yathā taṁ paguṇassa ganthassa sajjhāyane ñāyāgatāpi vārā na viññāyanti.
anya-e0104n2:6_20: Lakkhaṇapaṭivedhanti ca lakkhaṇānaṁ ārammaṇakaraṇamattaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:6_26: Attano pana anaññasādhāraṇena ānubhāvena ussakkitvā maggapātubhāvañca pāpeti.
anya-e0104n2:7_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṁ upamāya patiṭṭhāpetuṁ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:7_9: Te pakāreti indajālājātipupphādippakāre ceva chekādippakāre ca.
anya-e0104n2:8_1: Saññā vibhāgaṁ akatvā piṇḍavaseneva ārammaṇassa gahaṇato dārakassa kahāpaṇadassanasadisī vuttā.
anya-e0104n2:8_3: Viññāṇaṁ ārammaṇe ekaccavisesagahaṇasamatthatāya gāmikapurisassa kahāpaṇadassanasadisaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:8_4: Paññā ārammaṇe anavasesavisesāvabodhato heraññikassa kahāpaṇadassanasadisī vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:8_5: “Nānappakāratojānana”nti iminā ñeyyadhammā paccekaṁ nānappakārāti tesaṁ yāthāvato avabodho paññāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n2:8_6: Tathā hi vuttaṁ “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchantī”ti.
anya-e0104n2:9_1: Na tattha ekaṁsena hotīti tasmiṁ cittuppāde paññā ekantena na hoti.
anya-e0104n2:9_5: Yathā hi sukhaṁ pītiyā na niyamato aviyuttaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:9_6: evaṁ saññāviññāṇāni paññāya na niyamato aviyuttāti.
anya-e0104n2:9_7: Yathā pana pīti sukhena niyamato aviyuttā,
anya-e0104n2:9_9: Tasmā evaṁ avinibbhuttesu imesu tīsu dhammesu tesaṁ vinibbhogo dukkaroti tiṇṇaṁ janānaṁ kahāpaṇadassanaṁ nidassitanti.
anya-e0104n2:9_12: nānātelassa vā ekasmiṁ bhājane pakkhipitvā mathitassa “idaṁ asukāya nadiyā udakaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:9_13: idaṁ asukatela”nti niddhāretvā sarūpato dassanaṁ dukkaraṁ,
anya-e0104n2:9_14: kimaṅgaṁ pana arūpadhammesūti dassento “yaṁ arūpīnaṁ cittacetasikāna”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n2:10_5: Tadubhayassa ca yāthāvato paṭivijjhanalakkhaṇā paññāti āha “dhammasabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā paññā”ti.
anya-e0104n2:10_6: Ghaṭapaṭādipaṭicchādakassa bāhirandhakārassa dīpālokādi viya yathāvuttadhammasabhāvapaṭicchādakassa mohandhakārassa viddhaṁsanarasā.
anya-e0104n2:10_7: Uppajjamāno eva hi paññāloko hadayandhakāraṁ vidhamento evaṁ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n2:10_8: tato eva dhammasabhāvesu asammuyhanākārena paccupatiṭṭhatīti asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n2:10_9: Kāraṇabhūtā vā sayaṁ phalabhūtaṁ asammohaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpetīti evampi asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n2:10_10: Vipassanāpaññāya idha adhippetattā “samādhi tassā padaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:10_11: Tathā hi “samāhito yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī”ti suttapadaṁ nibandhanabhāvena āgataṁ.
anya-e0104n2:12_2: na tenassā koci vibhāgo labbhatīti āha “dhammasabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇena tāva ekavidhā”ti.
anya-e0104n2:12_6: Tattha apariyāpannatāya lokato uttarā uttiṇṇāti lokuttarā.
anya-e0104n2:12_8: Vipassanāpariyāyopi tassā labbhatevāti lokuttara-ggahaṇaṁ na virujjhati.
anya-e0104n2:12_9: Attānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā pavattehi saha āsavehīti sāsavā,
anya-e0104n2:12_16: sayampi vā bhavati uppajjati na nibbānaṁ viya apātubhāvanti bhūmi cāti dassanabhūmi,
anya-e0104n2:12_18: Sesamaggattayaṁ pana yasmā paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhasmiṁyeva dhamme bhāvanāvasena uppajjati,
anya-e0104n2:12_20: tasmā bhāvanā ca yathāvuttenatthena bhūmi cāti bhāvanābhūmi.
anya-e0104n2:12_28: upāye tassa tassa atthassa nibbattikāraṇe kosallaṁ upāyakosallanti visuṁ visuṁ kosallapadaṁ sambandhitabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:13_2: Samudāyesu pavattā samaññā tadekadesesupi vattatīti āha “maggasampayuttā”ti,
anya-e0104n2:13_3: paccekampi vā sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṁ maggasamaññāti katvā evaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:14_0: Dhammanānattābhāvepi padatthanānattamattena dukkaravacanaṁ hotīti vuttaṁ “atthato panesā lokiyalokuttarāvā”ti.
anya-e0104n2:14_5: tathā dutiyādijjhānikāni cāti evaṁ soḷasasu maggacittesu.
anya-e0104n2:14_6: Vipassanāpaññāya idha adhippetattā mahaggatapaññā na gahitā.
anya-e0104n2:15_0: 427.Attano cintāvasenāti tassa tassa anavajjassa atthassa sādhane paropadesena vinā attano upāyacintāvaseneva.
anya-e0104n2:15_2: Yathā tathā vāti parato upadesaṁ sutvā vā asutvā vā sayameva bhāvanaṁ anuyuñjantassa.
anya-e0104n2:16_2: kammañca taṁ āyatanañca ājīvānanti vā kammāyatanaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:16_10: Tāni panetāni ekacce paṇḍitā bodhisattasadisā manussānaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ ākaṅkhantā neva aññehi kariyamānāni passanti,
anya-e0104n2:16_13: Atha kho attano dhammatāya cintāya karonti,
anya-e0104n2:16_14: paññavantehi attano dhammatāya cintāya katānipi aññehi uggaṇhitvā karontehi katasadisāneva honti.
anya-e0104n2:17_4: Idānissa pavattanākāraṁ dassetuṁ “rūpaṁ aniccanti vā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:17_5: Tattha vā-saddena aniyamatthena dukkhānattalakkhaṇānipi gahitānevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ nānantariyakabhāvato.
anya-e0104n2:17_10: Yaṁ evarūpinti yaṁ evaṁ heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhasabhāvaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:17_12: Sā hi heṭṭhā vuttānaṁ kammāyatanādīnaṁ apaccanīkadassanena anulomanato,
anya-e0104n2:17_16: Sabbānipi etāni kāraṇāni khamati daṭṭhuṁ sakkotīti khanti.
anya-e0104n2:17_21: Te ca kammāyatanādayo dhammā etāya nijjhāyamānā nijjhānaṁ khamantīti dhammanijjhānakhanti.
anya-e0104n2:17_22: Parato asutvā paṭilabhatīti aññassa upadesavacanaṁ asutvā sayameva cintento paṭilabhati.
anya-e0104n2:17_23: Ayaṁ vuccatīti ayaṁ cintāmayā paññā nāma vuccati.
anya-e0104n2:17_27: Parato sutvā paṭilabhatīti kammāyatanādīni parena kariyamānāni vā katāni vā disvāpi parassa kathayamānassa
anya-e0104n2:17_28: vacanaṁ sutvāpi ācariyasantike uggahetvāpi paṭiladdhā sabbā parato sutvāva paṭiladdhā nāmāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n2:18_2: Sā lokuttaravipassanāti yā nibbānaṁ ārabbha pavattā appamāṇārammaṇā paññā vuttā,
anya-e0104n2:18_4: Sā hi saṅkhārānaṁ aniccatādiṁ agaṇhantīpi vipassanākiccapāripūriyā,
anya-e0104n2:18_5: nibbānassa vā tathalakkhaṇaṁ visesato passatīti vipassanāti vuccati.
anya-e0104n2:18_7: maggassa pana āvajjanaṭṭhāniyattā na vipassanāvohāraṁ labhati.
anya-e0104n2:19_1: Tattha kosallanti tasmiṁ anatthahāniatthuppattilakkhaṇe āye kosallaṁ kusalatā nipuṇatā.
anya-e0104n2:20_0: Taṁ pana ekantikaṁ āyakosallaṁ pāḷivaseneva dassetuṁ “ime dhamme”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:20_1: Tattha idaṁ vuccatīti yā imesaṁ akusaladhammānaṁ anuppattipahānesu,
anya-e0104n2:21_1: Tattha kosallanti tasmiṁ atthahānianatthuppattilakkhaṇe apāye kosallaṁ kusalatā apāyakosallaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:21_3: Tattha idaṁ vuccatīti yā imesaṁ kusaladhammānaṁ anuppajjananirujjhanesu,
anya-e0104n2:21_10: Paññavā eva hi “mayhaṁ evaṁ manasi karoto anuppannā kusalā dhammā nuppajjanti,
anya-e0104n2:21_14: so evaṁ ñatvā anuppanne akusale na uppādeti,
anya-e0104n2:22_2: Taṅkhaṇappavattanti accāyike kicce vā bhaye vā uppanne tassa tikicchanatthaṁ tasmiṁyeva khaṇe pavattaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:23_2: Ubhayaṁ gahetvāti “ajjhattaṁ bahiddhā”ti ubhayaṁ anupubbato pariggahetvā.
anya-e0104n2:23_4: sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamma”nti ekappahāreneva sabbepi pañcakkhandhe avibhāgena pariggahetvā.
anya-e0104n2:23_5: Ayaṁ pana tikkhavipassakassa mahāpuññassa bhikkhuno vipassanābhiniveso.
anya-e0104n2:24_1: tappaṭicchādakasammohavidhaṁsanavasena ca pavattaṁ ñāṇaṁ dukkhe ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:24_4: Paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṁ hi catusaccaṁ ārabbha pavattañāṇaṁ nāma,
anya-e0104n2:25_0: “Atthādīsu pabhedagatāni ñāṇānī”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṁ pāḷivaseneva vivarituṁ “vuttañheta”ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:25_1: Tattha atthe ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidāti yaṁ atthappabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṁ atthe pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:25_4: Dhammappabhedassa hi sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṁ dhamme pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
anya-e0104n2:25_7: Niruttipaṭibhānappabhedā tabbisayānaṁ atthādīnaṁ paccayuppannatādibhedehi bhinditvā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n2:26_2: “Yaṁ kiñci paccayasambhūta”nti etena saccahetudhammapaccayākāravāresu āgatāni dukkhādīni gahitāni.
anya-e0104n2:26_6: kiriyā cāti evaṁ pāḷiyaṁ vuttānaṁ eva vasena pañca atthā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n2:26_9: Tadatthaṁ pana vibhāvetuṁ “pavatteti vā sampāpuṇituṁ vā detī”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:26_12: maggo pana nibbānaṁ pāpetīti tasmiṁ pacchimo attho.
anya-e0104n2:26_15: itaro nibbattetabbo atthoti evaṁ tividho hoti.
anya-e0104n2:27_0: “Yo koci phalanibbattako hetū”ti etena saccahetudhammapaccayākāravāresu āgatāni samudayādīni gahitāni,
anya-e0104n2:27_3: abhidhammabhājanīye kusalākusalanti evaṁ pāḷiyaṁ vuttānaṁ eva vasena pañca dhammā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n2:27_6: itaraṁ nibbattakoti evaṁ tividho hetu veditabbo.
anya-e0104n2:27_7: Ettha ca kiriyānaṁ avipākatāya dhammabhāvo na vutto.
anya-e0104n2:27_8: Yadi evaṁ vipākā na hontīti atthabhāvopi na vattabbo? Na,
anya-e0104n2:27_10: Evaṁ sati kusalākusalānampi atthabhāvo āpajjatīti ce?
anya-e0104n2:27_12: Vipākassa pana padhānahetutāya pākaṭabhāvato dhammabhāvo eva tesaṁ vutto.
anya-e0104n2:27_15: Kammaphalasambandhassa pana hetubhāvassābhāvato dhammabhāvo na vutto.
anya-e0104n2:27_17: ayaṁ paccayuppanno”ti etaṁ bhedamakatvā kevalaṁ kusalākusale,
anya-e0104n2:27_18: vipākakiriyādhamme ca paccavekkhantassa dhammatthapaṭisambhidā hontīti tesaṁ atthadhammatā na vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:28_0: Ayameva hi atthoti yvāyaṁ atthadhammānaṁ pañcadhā vibhajanavasena attho vutto,
anya-e0104n2:29_3: tassa tassa atthassa bodhane paṭiniyatasambandho saddavohāroti attho.
anya-e0104n2:29_10: Na ca vacanato aññaṁ abhilapitabbaṁ uccāretabbaṁ atthi.
anya-e0104n2:29_12: evañca sati atthadhammānampi bodhetabbattā tesampi niruttibhāvo āpajjati.
anya-e0104n2:29_16: Tasmā vacanabhūtāya eva tassā sabhāvaniruttiyā abhilāpe uccāraṇeti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n2:30_0: Taṁ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṁ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ niruttipaṭisambhidā,
anya-e0104n2:30_2: na paññattiārammaṇā”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttattā niruttisaddārammaṇāya sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato manodvāre niruttipaṭisambhidā pavattatīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n2:30_3: “Niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannārammaṇā”ti ca vacanasaddaṁ gahetvā pacchā jānanaṁ sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e0104n2:30_4: Evaṁ pana aññasmiṁ paccuppannārammaṇe aññaṁ paccuppannārammaṇaṁ vuttanti āpajjati.
anya-e0104n2:30_5: Yathā pana dibbasotañāṇaṁ manussādisaddabhedanicchayassa paccayabhūtaṁ taṁtaṁsaddavibhāvakaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:30_7: ñāṇaṁ niruttipaṭisambhidāti vuccamāne na koci pāḷivirodho.
anya-e0104n2:30_8: “Taṁ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā paccavekkhantassā”ti ca “paccuppannasaddārammaṇaṁ paccavekkhaṇaṁ pavattentassā”ti na nasakkā vattuṁ.
anya-e0104n2:30_9: Tañhi ñāṇaṁ sabhāvaniruttiṁ vibhāventameva taṁtaṁsaddapaccavekkhaṇānantaraṁ taṁtaṁpabhedanicchayahetubhāvato
anya-e0104n2:30_10: niruttiṁ bhindantaṁ paṭivijjhantameva uppajjatīti pabhedagatampi hotīti.
anya-e0104n2:31_5: kusalakiriyābhūtāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya dhammatthabhāvato tīsu eva vā pavattattā “sabbattha ñāṇa”nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:31_8: kiccādikassa ca vasena “idaṁ ñāṇaṁ idaṁ nāma ārammaṇaṁ katvā pavattaṁ iminā nāma kiccenā”ti jānanaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:32_0: 429.Pabhedaṁ gacchantīti anekabhedabhinnesu ārammaṇesu tesaṁ yāthāvato taṁtaṁpabhedāvabodhanasamatthataṁ upagacchanti.
anya-e0104n2:33_0: Mahāsāvakānañca asekkhabhūmiyaṁ pabhedaṁ gatāti sāmaññavidhinā dassitamatthaṁ apavādena nivattetuṁ ānandatthera-ggahaṇaṁ kataṁ.
anya-e0104n2:34_3: sātisayaṁ vā adhigamaṁ sandhāya evaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:34_4: Sekkhena pattānampi hi imāsaṁ arahattappattiyā visadabhāvādhigamoti.
anya-e0104n2:34_5: Pubbayogo viya pana arahattappatti arahatopi paṭisambhidāvisadatāya paccayo na na hotīti pañcannampi
anya-e0104n2:34_7: Atthadhammādīnaṁ anavasesasaṅgaṇhanato buddhavacanavisayā eva pariyattiādayo dassitā.
anya-e0104n2:34_10: parito sabbaso ñātuṁ icchā paripucchāti āha “pāḷiaṭṭhakathādīsu gaṇṭhipadaatthapadavinicchayakathā”ti,
anya-e0104n2:34_12: adhippāyato ca duviññeyyaṭṭhānaṁ vitthārato sanniṭṭhānakathāti attho.
anya-e0104n2:34_23: tato ca yāva vasanaṭṭhānaṁ kammaṭṭhānānuyuttoti attho.
anya-e0104n2:36_3: Ṭhānāṭhānañāṇabalādīni sabbabuddhaguṇesu sakiccato pākaṭatarānīti vuttaṁ “dasa balāni viyā”ti,
anya-e0104n2:36_4: aññe vā sabbaññutaññāṇādayopi sabbe bhagavato guṇavisesā asekkhaphalavimokkhantikā eva.
anya-e0104n2:38_3: Kasmā panete evaṁ bahudhammā bhūmibhāvena gayhanti,
anya-e0104n2:38_4: nanu khandhādīsu ekenāpi atthasiddhi hotīti? Na,
anya-e0104n2:38_6: aññathā sabbasādhāraṇo anuggaho na kato siyā.
anya-e0104n2:38_7: Tividhā hi sattā rūpasammūḷhā arūpasammūḷhā ubhayasammūḷhāti.
anya-e0104n2:38_9: tadatthaṁ khandhānaṁ gahaṇaṁ arūpadhammānaṁ catudhā vibhattattā.
anya-e0104n2:38_15: saṁkhittarucī majjhimarucī vitthārarucīti ca tividhā sattā,
anya-e0104n2:38_16: tesampi atthāya yathākkamaṁ khandhādiggahaṇaṁ katanti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:38_17: Indriyaggahaṇaṁ pana kāmaṁ ete dhammā issarā viya sahajātadhammesu issariyaṁ ādhipaccaṁ pavattenti,
anya-e0104n2:38_19: na ettha kassaci vasībhāvo “suññā ete avasavattino”ti anattalakkhaṇassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:38_20: Taṁ panetaṁ catubbidhampi pavattinivattitadubhayahetuvasena diṭṭhameva upakārāvahaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:38_25: cittavisuddhiyañca ayaṁ paññā mūlajātā hoti, nāsatīti.
anya-e0104n2:38_27: Imissā hi paññāya santānavasena pavattamānāya pādapāṇisīsaṭṭhāniyā diṭṭhivisuddhiādikā imā pañca visuddhiyo
anya-e0104n2:39_5: tasmā atītādivibhāgabhinnaṁ sabbaṁ rūpaṁ rāsivasena buddhiyā ekajjhaṁ gahetvā “rūpameva khandho rūpakkhandho”ti samānādhikaraṇasamāso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n2:39_6: “Tīhi khandhehi iṇaṁ dassāmā”tiādīsu viya koṭṭhāsaṭṭhe pana khandha-sadde nibbānassāpi khandhantarabhāvo āpajjatīti?
anya-e0104n2:39_8: Na hi ekassa niccassa sato nibbānassa atītādivibhāgo atthīti.
anya-e0104n2:39_12: Kasmā panete khandhā pañceva vuttā iminā eva ca kamenāti?
anya-e0104n2:39_16: kammahetutañca cintetvā vedanāsaññā saṅkhārakkhandhato nīharitvā visuṁ khandhabhāvena desitā.
anya-e0104n2:41_3: Yaṁ-saddena hi sanipātena kiṁ-saddena ca gahitena aniyamatthatāya atippasaṅge āpanne taṁ ruppanasaddo nivatteti,
anya-e0104n2:41_10: Nanu ca arūpadhammānampi virodhipaccayasamāgame visadisuppatti labbhatīti?
anya-e0104n2:41_18: Virodhipaccayasannipāte yo attano santāne bhinne bhijjamānasseva visadisuppattihetubhāvo,
anya-e0104n2:41_20: Imasmiṁ pakkhe rūpayati vikāraṁ āpādetīti rūpaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:41_23: Imasmiṁ pakkhe arūpadhammesu rūpasamaññāya pasaṅgo eva natthi saṅghaṭṭanābhāvato.
anya-e0104n2:41_25: Sabbaṁ taṁ ekato katvāti rāsaṭṭhaṁ hadaye ṭhapetvā vadati.
anya-e0104n2:42_0: Bhūtopādāyabhedatoti ettha tadadhīnavuttitāya bhavati ettha upādāyarūpanti bhūtaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:43_1: sabhāvadhammānaṁ pana lakkhaṇādivibhāvanāti katvā vuttaṁ “lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānāni catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānī”ti.
anya-e0104n2:43_3: Avacanañca tassa tassatthassa paccayatoti ettha pakārantarena vibhāvitattāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:43_5: Āposaṅgahitāya tejonupālitāya vāyovitthambhitāya eva pathavīdhātuyā pavatti,
anya-e0104n2:44_4: viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṁ rūpaṁ assādentaṁ viya hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n2:44_11: Satipi sotādīnaṁ saddārammaṇādibhāve niruḷhattā dassane eva cakkhu-saddo pavattati padumādīsu paṅkajādisaddā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:44_12: Atha vā cakkhatīti viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṁ samavisamaṁ ācikkhantaṁ viya abhibyattaṁ vadantaṁ viya hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n2:44_14: Taṁ anekatthattā dhātūnaṁ vibhāvanatthatāpi cakkhati-saddassa sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:44_20: tasmiṁ ninnatāya taṁ avhāyatīti jivhā niruttinayena.
anya-e0104n2:44_21: Kucchitānaṁ sāsavadhammānaṁ āyo uppattiṭṭhānanti kāyo anuttariyahetubhāvaṁ anāgacchantesu kāmarāganidānakammajanitesu,
anya-e0104n2:44_22: kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesato sāsavapaccayattā.
anya-e0104n2:44_23: Tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṁ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti.
anya-e0104n2:44_24: Kāyindriyavatthukā vā cattāro khandhā balavakāmāsavādihetubhāvato visesena sāsavāti kucchitānaṁ sāsavadhammānaṁ āyoti kāyo vutto.
anya-e0104n2:44_26: rūpamiva pakāsaṁ karoti saviggahamiva dassetīti attho.
anya-e0104n2:44_27: Anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṁ pakāsanattho eva rūpasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n2:44_30: sakehi vā paccayehi sappīyati sotaviññeyyabhāvaṁ upanīyatīti attho.
anya-e0104n2:44_34: paṭicchannaṁ vā pupphaphalādiṁ “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṁ karontaṁ viya hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n2:45_6: Copanakāyabhāvato kāyo ca so adhippāyaviññāpanato viññatti cāti kāyaviññatti.
anya-e0104n2:45_8: adhippāyaviññāpanato ca vacī ca sā viññatti cāti vacīviññatti.
anya-e0104n2:46_0: Kamato pana sabbesaṁ rūpadhammānaṁ nissayabhāvena mūlabhūtattā paṭhamaṁ bhūtarūpāni uddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0104n2:46_1: Itaresu ajjhattikabhāvena attabhāvasamaññāya mūlabhāvato cakkhādīni pañca ādito uddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0104n2:46_2: Tesaṁ visayīnaṁ ime visayāti dassetuṁ rūpādīni cattāri uddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0104n2:46_4: bhūtaggahaṇena gahitattā ca idha na gahitaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:46_5: Svāyaṁ attabhāvo imehi “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti vā saṅkhaṁ gacchatīti dassanatthaṁ tadanantaraṁ itthipurisindriyadvayaṁ uddiṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:46_6: “Iminā jīvatī”ti vohāraṁ labbhatīti dassanatthaṁ tato jīvitindriyaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:46_7: Tassa imaṁ nissāya viññāṇappavattiyaṁ attahitādisiddhīti dassanatthaṁ hadayavatthu.
anya-e0104n2:46_8: Tassa imāsaṁ vasena sabbe kāyavacīpayogāti dassanatthaṁ viññattidvayaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:46_13: Sabbo cāyaṁ catusantatirūpasantāno iminā upatthambhīyatīti dassanatthaṁ ante kabaḷīkāro āhāro uddiṭṭhoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n2:47_1: Idāni yathāuddiṭṭhāni upādārūpāni lakkhaṇādito niddisituṁ “tattha rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādalakkhaṇa”ntiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:47_5: rūpābhighāto hotu vā mā vā evaṁsabhāvo catunnaṁ bhūtānaṁ pasādo rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādo,
anya-e0104n2:47_7: Yasmā paccayantarasahito eva cakkhupasādo rūpābhihananavasena pavattati,
anya-e0104n2:47_10: na rūpābhighātoti dassanatthaṁ rūpābhighātārahatā vuttā yathā vipākārahaṁ kusalākusalanti.
anya-e0104n2:47_11: Abhighāto ca visayavisayīnaṁ aññamaññaṁ abhimukhībhāvo yogyadesāvaṭṭhānaṁ abhighāto viyāti katvā.
anya-e0104n2:47_14: Tenāha “yaṁ cakkhu anidassanaṁ sappaṭighaṁ rūpamhi sanidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi paṭihaññi vā”ti,
anya-e0104n2:47_15: “yamhi cakkhumhi anidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi rūpaṁ sanidassanaṁ sappaṭighaṁ paṭihaññi vā paṭihaññati vā”ti ca ādi.
anya-e0104n2:47_17: rūpataṇhā ca tadāyatanikabhavapatthanābhāvato daṭṭhukāmatādivohāraṁ arahatīti dutiyanayo sabbattha vutto.
anya-e0104n2:47_21: Tassa tassa hi bhavassa mūlakāraṇabhūtā taṇhā tasmiṁ tasmiṁ bhave uppajjanārahāyatanavisayāpi nāma hotīti
anya-e0104n2:48_4: asati pana maggena asamugghātitabhāvoyeva kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:48_5: Yato maggena asamucchinnaṁ kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjitvā attano phalassa paccayabhāvūpagamanato vijjamānamevāti
anya-e0104n2:48_6: uppannatā atthitā pariyāyehi vuccati “ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāvento ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bahulīkaronto
anya-e0104n2:48_7: uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme antarāyeva antaradhāpetī”ti,
anya-e0104n2:48_8: “santaṁ vā ajjhattaṁ kāmacchandaṁ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṁ kāmacchando’ti pajānātī”ti ca evamādīsu.
anya-e0104n2:49_5: Ettha ca taṁtaṁattabhāvanipphādakasādhāraṇakammavasena purimaṁ cakkhulakkhaṇaṁ vuttaṁ kāraṇavisesassa anāmaṭṭhattā.
anya-e0104n2:49_6: “Evarūpaṁ nāma me cakkhu hotū”ti evaṁ nibbattitaāveṇikakammavasena dutiyanti vadanti.
anya-e0104n2:49_7: Satipi pana pañcannaṁ pasādabhāvasāmaññe savisayāvabhāsanasaṅkhātassa pasādabyāpārassa vasena purimaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:49_9: ekatte vā attano kāraṇabhedena bhedadassanavasena dutiyanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:50_4: Tattha nānākammunā tāva uppattiyaṁ cakkhādīnaṁ visese vattabbaṁ natthi kāraṇassa bhinnattā.
anya-e0104n2:50_5: Ekakammunā pana uppattiyaṁ kathaṁ nesaṁ visesoti?
anya-e0104n2:50_7: Taṁtaṁbhavapatthanābhūtā hi taṇhā taṁtaṁbhavapariyāpannāyatanābhilāsatāya sayaṁ vicittarūpā upanissayabhāvena
anya-e0104n2:50_9: Yato tadāhitavisesaṁ taṁ tathārūpasamatthatāyogenānekarūpāpannaṁ viya anekaṁ visiṭṭhasabhāvaṁ phalaṁ nibbatteti.
anya-e0104n2:50_10: Na cettha samatthatā samatthabhāvato aññā veditabbā kāraṇavisesena āhitavisesassa visiṭṭhaphalanipphādanayogyatāmattato.
anya-e0104n2:50_17: kammavipāko ca sabbaso buddhānaṁyeva ñāṇassa visayoti.
anya-e0104n2:51_1: Tesu hi vasudhammo evaṁ vadati “cakkhumhi tejo adhikaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:51_6: Cakkhādīsu tejādiadhikatā nāma tannissayabhūtānaṁ tadadhikatāyāti dassento “tejādhikānaṁ bhūtānaṁpasādo cakkhū”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n2:51_10: idaṁ pana “sabbesa”nti vacanaṁ samānānanti imamatthaṁ dīpeti anuvattamānassa ekadesādhikabhāvassa nivāraṇavasena vuttattā.
anya-e0104n2:51_11: Tejādīnaṁ hi paccekaṁ adhikabhāve viya dvinnaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:51_12: tiṇṇaṁ vā adhikabhāvepi yathāvuttādhikabhāveneva ekakādivasena labbhamānāya omattatāyapi kāyappasādo na hotīti pākaṭoyamattho.
anya-e0104n2:51_13: Tasmā catunnampi bhūtānaṁ samabhāvena kāyappasādo hotīti sabbasaddo idha samabhāvadīpako daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n2:51_21: vivarassa ca sotaviññāṇūpanissayabhāvo guṇoti tesaṁ laddhi.
anya-e0104n2:51_22: Tejādīnaṁ viya pana vivarassa bhūtabhāvābhāvato yathāyoga-ggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:51_23: Atha vā rūpādayo viya vivarampi bhūtaguṇoti parādhippāye tejassa ālokarūpena,
anya-e0104n2:51_27: pathaviyā phoṭṭhabbenāti evaṁ yathāyogaṁ taṁtaṁbhūtaguṇehīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n2:52_3: āpe ca rasassa madhurassāti imesaṁ visesayuttānaṁ dassanato “rūpādayo tesaṁ guṇā”ti paṭhamavādī āhāti.
anya-e0104n2:52_6: Atha vā rūpādivisesaguṇehi tejaākāsapathavīāpavāyūhi cakkhādīni katānīti vadantassa kaṇādassa vādaṁ uddharitvā
anya-e0104n2:52_8: Āsave upalabbhamānopi gandho pathaviyā āposaṁyuttāya kappāsato visadisāyāti na kappāsagandhassa adhikabhāvāpattīti ce? Na,
anya-e0104n2:52_10: Āsave hi udakasaṁyuttā pathavī udakena abhibhūtā,
anya-e0104n2:52_11: na kappāsapathavīti tassa eva gandhena adhikena bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:52_12: Uṇhodakasaṁyutto ca aggi upalabbhanīyo mahantoti katvā tassa phasso viya vaṇṇopi pabhassaro upalabbheyyāti
anya-e0104n2:52_13: uṇhodake vaṇṇato agginā anabhisambandhassa sītodakassa vaṇṇo parihāyetha.
anya-e0104n2:52_16: Tannivattanena “tejādīnaṁ guṇehi rūpādīhi anuggayhabhāvato”ti idaṁ kāraṇaṁ nivattitanti evaṁ paramparāya
anya-e0104n2:52_17: ubhayābhāvo visesaparikappanapahānassa kāraṇaṁ hotīti āha “tasmā pahāyeta”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n2:52_19: ko pana vādo nānākalāpe cakkhādayo bhūtavisesābhāvepīti dassetuṁ rūparasādinidassanaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:53_1: kiṁ pana cakkhādivisesassa kāraṇanti taṁ dassetuṁ “yaṁ aññamaññassā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:53_2: Ekampi kammaṁ pañcāyatanikattabhāvabhavappatthanānipphannaṁ cakkhādivisesahetutāya aññamaññassa asādhāraṇanti ca kammavisesoti ca vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:53_3: Na hi taṁ yena visesena cakkhussa paccayo,
anya-e0104n2:53_5: “Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggatā cetanā kaṭattārūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanena paṭisandhikkhaṇe
anya-e0104n2:53_6: vijjamānānaṁ sabbesaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ ekā cetanā kammapaccayo hotīti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n2:53_7: Nānācetanāya hi tadā indriyuppattiyaṁ sati parittena ca mahaggatena ca kammunā nibbattitaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ āpajjeyyāti.
anya-e0104n2:53_8: Na cekā paṭisandhi anekakammanibbattā hotīti siddhamekena kammena anekindriyuppatti hotīti.
anya-e0104n2:54_3: Gandharasānaṁ nissayā ghānajivhānaṁ nissaye allīyantīti te nissayavasena allīnā.
anya-e0104n2:54_10: cittajo saddo sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṁ na siyā.
anya-e0104n2:54_11: Na hi bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ uppatti atthi.
anya-e0104n2:54_14: attano visayipadesassa eva gahetabbato gandho viya.
anya-e0104n2:54_18: nanu dūre ṭhitehi rajakādisaddā cirena suyyantīti?
anya-e0104n2:54_20: Yathā hi dūrāsannānaṁ vacanasadde yathāpākaṭe gahaṇavisesato ākāravisesānaṁ aggahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0104n2:54_22: evaṁ rajakādisaddepi āsannassa ādito pabhuti yāva avasānā kamena pākaṭībhūte,
anya-e0104n2:54_24: majjhe vā piṇḍavasena pavattipākaṭībhūte nicchayaggahaṇānaṁ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato pavattānaṁ visesato lahukaṁ suto “cirena suto”ti adhimāno hoti.
anya-e0104n2:54_27: Yadi saddassa bhūtaparamparāya samantato pavatti natthi,
anya-e0104n2:54_30: bhājanādicalanassa ca ayokanto viya ayocalanassa paccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:55_1: Pubbe lakkhaṇādinā vibhāvitampi cakkhuṁ ṭhitaṭṭhānādito vibhāvetuṁ “cakkhu cetthā”tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:55_7: Snehamiva satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā ṭhitāheva attano nissayabhūtāhi catūhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṁ tannissiteheva
anya-e0104n2:55_8: āyuvaṇṇādīhi anupālitaṁ parivāritaṁ tisantatirūpasamuṭṭhāpakehi utucittāhārehiupatthambhiyamānaṁ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n2:55_10: Pamāṇato ūkāsiramattanti ūkāsiramatte padese pavattanato vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:55_11: Cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthubhāvaṁ nissayabhāvato āvajjanasampaṭicchanādīnaṁ tadārammaṇāvasānānaṁ dvārabhāvaṁ samavasaraṭṭhānato.
anya-e0104n2:55_13: tatthāpi paccekaṁ anekakalāpagatabhāvato anekampi samānaṁ sāmaññaniddesena āvajjanāya ekattā,
anya-e0104n2:55_14: ekasmiṁ khaṇe ekasseva ca kiccakarattā ekaṁ katvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:56_0: Manupassatīti ma-kāro padasandhikaro, atha vā manūti macco.
anya-e0104n2:58_4: upādinnakajjhāsayatāya kāyo āmakasusānābhiratasiṅgālo viya passitabboti dassento “vammi…pe…
anya-e0104n2:58_6: Visamajjhāsayatā ca cakkhussa visamajjhāsayaṁ viya hotīti katvā vuttā,
anya-e0104n2:58_7: cakkhumato vā puggalassa ajjhāsayavasena cakkhu visamajjhāsayaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n2:58_9: Sabbopi ca yathāvutto papañco sotādīsupi yathārahaṁ veditabbo.
anya-e0104n2:60_5: Tato eva “itthī”ti taṁsahitaṁ santānaṁ pakāsentaṁ viya hotīti vuttaṁ “itthīti pakāsanarasa”nti.

anya-e0104n2:62_10: Attanā anupālanavasena yāpetabbāni pavattetabbāni bhūtāni etassa padaṭṭhānanti yāpayitabbabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṁ.
